Method Detail

getScore

public int getScore(int type,
                    int pattern)
returns the basic score for a particular pattern

Parameters:
type - simple, terminal, wind, special wind or dragon
pattern - pair, chow, pung or kong
Returns:
basic tile points

getBasicMultiplier

public int getBasicMultiplier(int type,
                              int pattern)
returns the basic multiplier for a particular pattern

Parameters:
type - simple, terminal, wind, special wind or dragon
pattern - pair, chow, pung or kong
Returns:
number of multipliers

getHiddenMultiplier

public int getHiddenMultiplier(int type)
returns the basic multiplier for a hidden pattern

Parameters:
type - at the moment, there is only three concealed triplets
Returns:
number of multipliers

getFullPatternMultiplier

public int getFullPatternMultiplier(int type)
consulation method for hidden multipliers

Parameters:
type - any of the full pattern multipliers
Returns:
number of multipliers

calculateScores

public int[] calculateScores(int[] tilepoints,
                             int winner,
                             int east)
Determines the final score, given all scored tile points

Parameters:
tilepoints - int[] array with player 1-4's tile points
winner - the number of the player who won
east - the player number who played east this hand
Returns:
an int[] array with the resolved scores

won

public boolean won(int[] hand)
determines whether or not a hand qualifies as "winning hand" according to this ruleset.

Parameters:
hand - the int[] array of all tiles in the hand
Returns:
whether or not this hand wins
